articleContent:
Dear Rovers,
Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 3.1: For You Who Walk in Snow.
 
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦Maintenance Time: 2026-02-05 04:00 - 2026-02-05 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2026-02-05 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation will remain claimable until the next version update.
※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
 
✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2026-02-05 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation will remain claimable until the next version update.
 
[Version Update Details]
✦New Resonators✦
5-Star Resonator: Aemeath (Fusion/Sword)
Once an Exostrider Synchronist of Rabelle College, she is now a digital ghost who sings quietly amongst stars.
●Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Liberation DMG, Tune Rupture Response, Fusion Burst, DMG Amplification
※Obtainable through the [Take Flight in Spring] Featured Resonator Convene.
 
5-Star Resonator: Luuk Herssen (Spectro/Gauntlets)
The attending physician of Startorch Academy's Resonator Nursing Unit, renowned for his keen intellect and unshakable composure. Rumor has it nobody has ever seen him lose control.
He is a keen listener adept at dissecting the shadows in a person's heart. From the unhealing wound on his hand, golden blood seeps, a substance he can summon to become a blade of utmost precision.
●Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Basic Attack DMG, Tune Strain Response
※Obtainable through the [When Winter Thaws] Featured Resonator Convene.
 
✦New Weapons✦
5-Star Weapon: Everbright Polestar (Sword)
As you drift across the hushed sea of stars, stardust scatters beside you as time crumbles in your wake. All that remains is the unyielding loneliness, warped, diluted, and remade into the plumes of your wings. The universe sends you on a tribulation of silence, yet you travel on, repaying in radiance.
※Obtainable through the [Everbright Polestar] Featured Weapon Convene.
 
5-Star Weapon: Daybreaker's Spine (Gauntlets)
Those are not ridges of the mountains, but the spine of the earth, carrying the night. They protrude from the abdomen of darkness.
From the incision spills the light of new life. Your shadow was nailed to the dying night, with the breaking dawn, your flesh shall rise.
Let it knock open every door of denial.
※Obtainable through the [Daybreaker's Spine] Featured Weapon Convene.
 
✦New Area✦
Roya Frostlands: Frostlands Surface
Area includes: Frostlands Transit Port, Mount Gjallar, Starblind Crashsite, Upphaf Forest Ruins, Tidelost Forest
 
Once a fjord roamed by the Roya nomads, this land has now become an expanse of ice that isolates Lahai-Roi from the outside world.
A high-traffic coastal zone where the port and its transport arteries move personnel and supplies around the clock.
Researchers at the research station study the remains that fell from the heavens and unearth ancient creatures sealed beneath ice; across ice and mist, the Shepherds lead the Exoswarm on their migration to the edge of the permafrost, where the Exostrider lies in slumber...
※Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter III Act III "The Star That Voyages Far."
 
✦New Echoes✦
Sigillum, Nameless Explorer, Iceglint Dancer, Shadow Stepper, Kronablight, Reminiscence - Kronaclaw, Glommoth
 
●New Tacet Discord Nest: Starblind Crashsite Tacet Discord Nest
※A set number of Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.
 
●New Sonata Effects: Trailblazing Star, Chromatic Foam, Sound of True Name
Trailblazing Star (5pcs Set): Inflicting Fusion Burst or Tune Rupture - Shifting increases the Resonator's Crit. Rate by 20% and grants 20% Fusion DMG Bonus for 8s.
Chromatic Foam (5pcs Set): When the Resonator inflicts Fusion Burst on the enemies, they gain the following effects: Gain 10 Fusion DMG Bonus for 15s. While this effect is active, casting an Outro Skill grants the incoming Resonator 25% Fusion DMG Bonus for 15s.
Sound of True Name (5pcs Set): Dealing Echo Skill DMG to enemies increases the Resonator's Echo Skill Crit. Rate by 20%, and grants 15% Aero DMG Bonus for 5s.
 
✦New Stories✦
[Main Quest Chapter III Act III] The Star That Voyages Far
After a sudden assault by a mysterious mech, your frequency loss worsens. Aemeath appears once more to aid you. To find a solution to your frequency loss and help this digital ghost reclaim her "existence," you journey together to the Roya Frostlands, toward the frozen, bleak land where the Exostrider lies in slumber...
 
✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 3.1 update.
✦Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter III Act II "Ode to the Second Sunrise."
 
[Segue: Afterstory] All That Sunlight Touches
After returning from the Frostlands, you consult Luuk Herssen at the Academy infirmary regarding the Exostrider plan. The ever-smiling doctor reveals a sliver of the truth behind the Fractsidus. At the same time, a Fractsidus member abducts the Roya student who once traveled with you and retreats to a fallen space station on the Frostlands...
 
✦Duration: Permanently available after 2026-02-26 10:00 (server time)
✦Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter III Act III "The Star That Voyages Far."
 
✦New Events & Gameplay Features✦
[Special Events]
[Where Stars Cascade Down] Limited-Time Event
An endless revelry unfolds within a nameless Sonoro Sphere. Though the festival seems eternal, the Sonoro will one day fade. To grant it a vibrant finale, Lollo Logistics hosts a special party, a final call for everyone to gather, shine brilliantly, and share one last, joyous celebration.
✦Duration: 2026-02-15 04:00 - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)
 
[Unfrozen Traces] Area Exploration Event
The frostlands of Lahai-Roi beckon the curious. Many find their eyes fixed upon the endless white expanses. Truth seekers walk this polar region, one step at a time, chasing but echoes of truth in this land of snow where silence reigns. Now, join them in their exploration of the frostlands and go where no one has ever been before.
✦Duration: Version 3.1 Update - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)
 
[Footprints on Frostlands] Photo Collection Event
A total of 6 Chrono Traces are scattered throughout Roya Frostlands: Frostlands Surface. Explore areas according to the clues and snap the correct photo or search the target location to complete Collection tasks and claim the rewards.
✦Duration: After the Version 3.1 update
 
[Peaks of Prestige: Rekindled Duel] Echo Combat Event
Build your own custom Peaks of Prestige decks using new special cards and face off against every duelist in Lahai-Roi and Roya Frostlands: Frostlands Surface!
✦Duration: After the Version 3.1 update
 
[TERM-X: Outreach] Exploration Event
Upgrade Expansion Modules under the expedition motorbike's All-Terrain Tactics to unlock and claim rewards.
✦Duration: Version 3.1 Update - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)
 
[Full Throttle! Bolt & Blitz!] Leisure Event
Select a Resonator to challenge the tracks with H.E.R.M.E.S. with an arsenal of new weapons.
✦Duration: 2026-02-07 04:00 - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)
 
[Rein Back! Migration Mayhem!] Leisure Event
A team of Royan herders has run into trouble while guiding their Exoswarm across the frostlands. Now, they need your help to track down the strays.
✦Duration: 2026-02-19 04:00 - 2026-03-09 03:59 (server time)
 
[Blade Hunter: Wilderness] Featured Combat Event
Around a Sonoro Sphere, you run across a troubled researcher, who seems to have an important job to do...
✦Duration: 2026-02-26 10:00 - 2026-03-16 03:59 (server time)
 
[Lollo Campaign: Implementation] Featured Commission Event
Complete the campaigns to claim your Lollo Stamps—a gift of gratitude from Lollo Logistics. Lollo Stamps can be exchanged for Lollo Helper special deliveries.
✦Duration: 2026-03-05 04:00 - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)
 
[Gifts of Soft Snow] 7-Day Login Event
During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.
✦Duration: Version 3.1 Update - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)
 
[Web Event]
Veins of the Frostlands
Visit the snow-covered, windswept Frostlands and help repair the powerlines to win Astrites and Shell Credits! Complete event tasks to win Advanced Sealed Tubes and more.
✦Duration: 2026-02-26 04:00 - 2026-03-12 03:59 (UTC+8)
 
[Limited-Time Only]
Weekly Subscription
Purchase to activate Weekly Subscription. Weekly Subscription will be valid for 15 days upon activation. Log in on the specific days during the subscription period to claim rewards, earning up to Lunite x680, Astrite x1600, and Transducer x1.
Availability: Version 3.1 Update - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)
 
Moonlit Path
During the event, obtain Moonlit Rings to unlock and claim rewards.
✦Duration: Version 3.1 Update - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)
 
[Special Gift Giving Events]
Unsigned Good Wishes
During the event, claim a total of Astrite x1600, Avatar: Come On, Smile, and other rewards via in-game mail.
✦Duration: 2026-02-17 00:00 - 2026-03-19 03:59 (UTC+8)
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 2.
 
Startorch for You
Rovers who meet the requirements can obtain the free Signature Outfit "Perpetual Spark" for Rover. Both sets of Outfits and Avatars are obtainable upon claiming.
✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 3.1 update.
✦Eligibility: With the "Events" function unlocked, complete Main Quest Chapter III Act III "The Star That Voyages Far" to unlock and claim the rewards.
 
✦Other New Content✦
●New "Tactical Hologram: Synchronization" Challenge: Reactor Husk
●New Phantom Echo: Phantom - Sigillum
●New Sigils: A Night to Remember, Concealed Starlight
●New Titles: Law of Stars, Roving Lodestar
●Glider Aspect: Cosmic Spindle
※Participate in the Limited-Time Event "Where Stars Cascade Down" to win Phantom: Sigillum and Sigil: A Night to Remember; participate in the Leisure Event "Full Throttle! Bolt & Blitz!" to win Title: Roving Lodestar.
 
[Adjustments and Optimizations]
✦Resonators & Weapons✦
●Resonators' Movements
Optimized Resonators' Movements
- Basic movements: walking, running, jumping, and stopping.
- Advanced movements: climbing, gliding, flying, moving up and down stairs, and getting hit.
- In Version 3.1, the above movements, along with the transition between different movements, will be smoother.
- Resonators with different body types move slightly differently.
 
- Optimized the visuals when certain skills hit targets for some Resonators.
 
✦Features✦
●Expedition Motorbike:
Added Glacier Track
- As you progress through the Main Quests, the Glacier Track ability will be unlocked for the expedition motorbike, allowing it to drive across open water.
 
Added "All-Terrain Tactics" Expansion Module
- As you progress through the Main Quests, new Expansion Modules, which provide various buffs, will be unlocked for the expedition motorbike. The "All-Terrain Tactics" Expansion Module will be unlocked in Version 3.1's Main Quest.
- To switch between Expansion Modules, go to the Motorbike Expansion Module page or the Expansion Module Switch of the Vehicle section of the Utility wheel. Only one Expansion Module can be active at a time.
- Core Module remains effective when switching between different Expansion Modules, while Combat Modules change with the selected Expansion Module.
 
Added New Content to Motorbike Looks
- Added two new motorbike cosmetics categories: Chassis Set and Motorbike Accessory.
- Visit Expedition Motorbike > Motorbike Appearance to make adjustments to the motorbike looks.
 
Optimized Autopilot Mode
- When navigating across the map, you can use Fast Travel to teleport to the nearest beacon that responds to Autopilot Mode and activate Autopilot Mode.
 
Optimized Adaptive Hook
- Adjusted the trigger order concerning Adaptive Hook. Adaptive Hook will be triggered, instead of Autopilot Mode, when Adaptive Hook is available.
- Minimized the incidence of triggering another function accidentally when using Adaptive Hook multiple times in succession.
 
- Added an HUD display of the Expedition Motorbike's dashboard in the first-person view.
- Optimized the visual presentation and color display of the Expedition Motorbike's dashboard.
 
●Starpaths Intertwined:
Added Starpaths Intertwined Giveback Event
- Complete Starpath Tasks to earn Journey Points. Reach Journey Point milestones to claim Starpath Gifts.
- You can obtain Journey Points by logging in to the game, obtaining 5-Star Resonators/weapons, and obtaining Trophies.
- There is a Journey Point limit for each Starpath Task. Once the limit is reached, no additional points can be obtained from that task.
- The Starpaths Intertwined menu will pop up when you log in to the game after Version 3.1 goes live. Or alternatively, you can access it via Terminal > Profile > Starpaths Intertwined.
※For more details about the rules, please visit the in-game Starpaths Intertwined page when Version 3.1 goes live.
 
●Material Tracking
Optimized Material Acquisition Process
- Clicking on a material via the Backpack or Resonators screen and selecting the "Tacet Discord" acquisition path will now directly track the Tacet Discords that drop the material on the map, instead of jumping to the Enemy Tracing menu.
- When the tracked Tacet Discords are defeated, the next group of Tacet Discords will be automatically tracked.
 
✦Leveling✦
●Data Bank:
Added Targeted Merge
- This feature unlocks at Data Bank Lv. 15. Upon unlocking it, you can access it via Data Bank > Data Merge.
- You can merge 5 un-upgraded 5-Star Echoes into a random new Echo of the Sonata Effect of your choice. Targeted Merge does not produce extra Echoes.
- Targeted Merge can be used up to 10 times per week, and resets at 04:00 (server time) every Monday.
※In Targeted Merge, you can't select a Sonata Effect for which no Cost-1 or Cost-3 Echo has been unlocked.
 
Added Substat Data Modification
- Data Modify unlocks at Data Bank Level 21. Upon unlocking it, you can access it via Data Bank > Data Modify and start Modifying Substats.
- Use a Transducer to adjust the Substats of a selected Echo to random stats, excluding locked Substats. This can only be done on fully tuned 5-star Echoes.
- The number of locked Substats determines the amount of Transducers consumed in each Modification: With 2 or fewer locked stats, consume 1 Transducer. With 3 locked stats, consume 2 Transducers. With 4 locked stats, consume 3 Transducers.
- You may choose whether to apply the Modification results in Substat Modification. Discarding the result does not refund used Transducers.
※Substat Modification results that are not confirmed due to unexpected errors will be saved in the server for up to 30 days. Please confirm your results in time.
 
Adjusted Mainstat Data Modification
- Added batch modification for Echo Mainstats.
- Up to 10 Echoes can be selected in a single Mainstat Data Modification attempt.
 
✦Challenges, Puzzles, & Events✦
- Optimized the UI for the "Smartprint Cube Reboot" event.
- Optimized the descriptions of some tasks in the "Reprise of Tides" event.
 
✦Controls✦
●Expedition Motorbike
Added New Joystick Control Option on Mobile
- Mobile users can select this option via Settings > Controls.
- With this option, you can control the motorbike's movement direction entirely through the joystick.
- Please note that after the Version 3.1 update, the default control for the Expedition Motorbike on mobile devices will be the joystick.
 
- Improved camera control on mobile devices. When performing Boost or Bounce Jump, you can now adjust the camera view by simply pressing and dragging.
 
●Controller Vibration
Expanded Controller Vibration Support on PC/Console
- Added haptic feedback through controller vibration at key story moments.
- Added haptic feedback through controller vibration while riding the Expedition Motorbike.
 
- Added haptic feedback through controller vibration while using the Utility wheel.
- Added haptic feedback through controller vibration when a 5-Star Resonator/weapon is obtained in Convene.
 
✦UI✦
- Adjusted the mechanics of how the Region Guide content is displayed on the Map screen. It will now display the gameplay features of the region you're checking on the map, instead of the region you're currently in.
- Added the Echo Management tab on the Data Bank page. You can access the Echo Management menu using the tab.
- Adjusted the display/UI of the Quests menu; an icon indicating the unavailability of Co-op mode will appear on the quests that can't be completed in Co-op mode.
- Adjusted the order in which Sonata sets are displayed when the filter feature is used on the Sonata Gallery or Echo Equipment pages; the newer Sonata sets will now be displayed at the top.
 
✦Graphics & Performance✦
●PC Graphics
Added Display of Device Info on PC
- View the information of the current device via Settings > Graphics > Device Info.
- The information includes CPU, Memory, Graphics Card, and other hardware info, as well as Graphics Driver version and other runtime environment info.
- This information may help you better identify the cause of issues that affect the smooth running of the game.
 
Extended Ray Tracing to Some PC Devices Equipped with AMD
- Ray Tracing is supported in Version 3.1 on devices equipped with RX 9000 series graphics cards.
Please note that the Graphics Driver needs to be updated to Adrenalin 25.10.2 or newer in order for Ray Tracing to take effect when enabled.
 
- Added interaction effects to snow and specific types of vegetation in Roya Frostlands: Frostlands Surface on PC.
- Optimized visual effects of the interaction with petal piles in Chronorift Metropolis on PC.
- Adjusted the Capsule AO options on PC. Three options are now available: Low, Medium, and High, instead of two (On/Off).
- Adjusted the default graphics settings on PC. Lower settings will now be selected by default for some entries to better fit the hardware performance of the device.
※Note: HDR support, originally planned for release in Version 3.1, will not be available in this upcoming version, as it has not yet met the required standard. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may experience. Please stay tuned for official announcements regarding the availability of HDR support. Thank you for your support and understanding.
 
●Mobile Graphics
Extended Ultra High Resolution Option to More Mobile Devices
- The Ultra High resolution option will be available for more mobile devices in Version 3.1. To enable this option, the processor must meet one of the following requirements:
①Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 or newer
②MediaTek Dimensity 8400 or newer, MediaTek Dimensity 9300 or newer
③Exynos 2500 or newer
- To enable this option, go to Settings > Graphics
- Enabling this option will increase the clarity of in-game visuals.
※Due to variations in the in-game settings and system environment, enabling the option may occasionally cause performance issues, in-game glitches, and hardware-related issues. If you encounter any issue, please try disabling the option. If the issue persists, please contact customer support for further assistance.
 
- Added interactivity between the expedition motorbike and certain water surfaces.
- Added the "Recommended Settings Applied" option. Click the button in the bottom right corner of the Graphics settings menu to apply the recommended Graphics settings.
- Added support for the "90FPS" option on Redmagic 11 series.
- Optimized the game's resource loading performance by updating the loading pipeline and accelerating data streaming, to help reduce loading stutter on some PC/mobile devices with lower specs.
※For a smoother gaming experience, it's recommended that the game be installed on an SSD.
 
✦Audio✦
- Added Voicelines for when Resonators cast Tune Break.
- Added sound effects when Boost is triggered for the expedition motorbike; the sound effects vary throughout the different acceleration stages.
- Optimized the sound effects and stereo associated with certain enemies, making it easier to locate the enemies in combat.
 
✦Other✦
- Added a new Activity task: Clear Nightmare Nest or Tacet Discord Nest 1 time. Complete the task to obtain 20 Activity Points.
- Improved the clarity of the guide on the process of accepting Side Quest "Return to Light."
- Adjusted the dialogue text for certain Startorch Academy NPCs.
- Optimized the descriptions of some tasks in the "Reprise of Tides" event.
- Optimized certain prompts (text) in Co-op Mode.
- Optimized certain prompts (text) for when there is a Trial Resonator in the lineup.
- Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.
 
[Bug Fixes]
●Resonators & Weapons
- Fixed an issue in the "Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways" event where Observation Marker might be granted to Resonator Mornye's teammates in the lineup after she casts Heavy Attack "Inversion."
- Fixed an issue where enabling "Ray Tracing" caused the shadow effects for Resonator Mornye's character model to perform abnormally in some situations.
- Fixed an issue where the lighting effects accompanying Resonator Mornye's character model displayed on the "Resonators - Echo" page failed to perform normally in some situations.
- Fixed an issue where certain player actions could cause Resonator Lynae's character model to behave abnormally during Basic Attack.
- Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Lynae's character model displayed on the "Resonators - Overview“ page.
- Fixed an issue where Resonator Lynae's Plunging Attack animation sometimes failed to perform normally while in the "Kaleidoscopic Parade" state.
- Fixed an issue where the text displayed on the "Resonators - Information" page for Resonator Lynae contained duplicates.
- Fixed an issue where the time stop effect was not applied to some objects when Resonator Augusta cast Resonance Liberation "Sublime is the Sun" in certain parts of the Roya Frostlands.
- Fixed an issue where the character models of Resonators Augusta and Carlotta behaved abnormally under certain lighting effects.
- Fixed an issue where Resonance Skill "Harmonic Allegro" could not be cast immediately after Resonator Ciaccona cast Tune Break.
- Fixed an issue where certain enemies did not take damage from Jolt when triggered by Resonator Cantarella.
- Fixed an issue where if Resonator Rover was moving from one location to another location via Mechascout: Transition while wearing an Accessory (such as Unfettered Dove through Day and Night), the Accessory might partially appear on the screen during the process.
- Fixed an issue where incorrect damage was dealt when Resonator Lumi's Resonance Skill - Energized Pounce or Resonance Skill - Energized Rebound, with the second Resonance Chain node "Lollo Logistics, Ready to Help" activated, hit the targets.
- Fixed an issue where character models appeared blurry upon entering the Resonators page under certain circumstances.
 
●Enemies & Echoes
- Fixed an issue in the fight with the enemy "the False Sovereign" where triggering multiple Counterattacks in succession could cause the wrong amount of Vibration Strength to be deducted when some of the Counterattacks hit the enemy.
- Fixed an issue where Echo Skill "Twin Nova: Collapsar Blade," after being cast, did not end when it should have.
- Fixed an issue where some Cuddle Wuddle models in certain parts of Rinascita sank below ground.
 
●Features
- Fixed an issue where the screen might become unresponsive when an attempt was made to jump to the Sonata Gallery page via the Resonator Ascension Planner.
- Fixed an issue where the prompt showing the new motorbike level failed to display properly.
- Fixed an issue where closing the "Map - Overview" menu for "Fabricatorium of the Deep" with a controller was not possible in some situations.
- Fixed an issue where the buttons of certain controllers might become unresponsive during the game.
- Fixed an issue where the enemies displayed for the "Forgery Challenge - Corroded Remnants" domain did not match the actual enemies in the domain.
- Fixed an issue where the description of "Roya Frostlands - Bjartr Woods - Submerged Tunnel" that appeared on the Map screen was incomplete.
- Fixed an issue where the levels of the characters in the current lineup were incorrectly displayed upon exiting the exploration area during the "Stranger Things in Honami" event.
- Fixed an issue where the description of the item "Constructor Core" contained textual errors.
- Fixed an issue where the Etching Plains exploration report and Rebirth Uplands exploration report contained textual errors.
- Fixed an issue where the "Tutorials - Adventure" page contained textual errors.
- Fixed an issue where the red dot on the Utilities icon could not be removed in some situations.
- Fixed an issue where the tracks in Heart Radio Channel were not played in the correct order after an adjustment had been made to the order.
- Fixed an issue where the Heart Radio Channel music might stop playing unexpectedly.
- Fixed an issue on Mobile where the "Recommended" icon did not appear on the menu that prompted players to select a server.
- Fixed an issue where the VFX accompanying the Hecate image displayed on the "Gallery - Enemies" page failed to display properly.
- Fixed an issue in the "Doubled Pawns Matrix: Pilot" event where multiple instances of Viral Infection were applied to some of the enemies inflicted with Tune Break by Resonators using Swords or Broadblades.
- Fixed an issue where image resolution was low when some images contained in Lynae's WavesLine were enlarged.
- Fixed an issue where certain WavesLine messages contained textual errors.
- Fixed an issue where Frame Generation could not be enabled on OPPO devices equipped with Dimensity 9400 or Dimensity 9400+ processors. After Version 3.1 goes live, if Frame Generation does not take effect after being enabled, please try updating the operating system to the latest version.
※ We are still working to identify issues affecting the game on the Realme series of devices. Frame Generation support will remain unavailable on these devices for the time being. Please stay tuned for official announcements regarding the date of its restoration.
- Fixed an issue where certain character models, in story scenes or otherwise, might behave abnormally on some Android devices with Vulkan enabled.
- Fixed an issue where the screens of certain devices might go black or flash under certain circumstances.
- Fixed an issue where certain player actions could cause the login menu to reappear after a successful login.
- Fixed an issue on Mac where the screen flashed when displaying the Expedition Motorbike page.
- Fixed an issue where enabling Auto Exposure on devices equipped with Intel integrated graphics could cause the game graphics to perform abnormally.
- Fixed an issue where the time displayed on the Chat screen did not match the current time in some situations.
 
●Challenges, Puzzles, & Events
- Fixed an issue where an incorrect number of rewards might be granted for completing Hot Spring Stargazing. The difference (Astrite x5) will be issued to the game accounts of the Rovers who have encountered this issue when Version 3.1 goes live.
- Fixed an issue in the "Hot Spring Stargazing" event where character models behaved abnormally under certain circumstances.
- Fixed an issue in the "Tower of Adversity" event where certain skills could be cast by some Resonators before a challenge officially started.
- Fixed an issue in the current cycle of "Whimpering Wastes - Forbidden Waters" where the description of the Environment Report did not match the actual effects in Stages 1 - 6.
- Fixed an issue in the "Motorbike Racing" event where the expedition motorbike could be driven outside the track under certain circumstances.
- Fixed an issue where certain icons for Huanglong's Tactical Hologram challenges failed to display properly.
- Fixed an issue where Blobflies in certain areas did not travel along the expected routes.
- Fixed an issue in the "Operation: Frontier Renewal" event where the screen might go black when displaying the event page.
- Fixed an issue in the "Operation: Frontier Renewal" event where the event rules contained textual errors.
- Fixed an issue in the "Operation: Frontier Renewal" event where certain player actions could cause the Network Terminal animation to perform abnormally.
- Fixed an issue in the "Peaks of Prestige: Rekindled Duel" event where certain player actions could cause part of the text accompanying the Echo card "KU-Roro: Max Firepower" to disappear.
- Fixed an issue in the "Peaks of Prestige: Rekindled Duel" event where the current set started without the corresponding input in some situations.
- Fixed an issue in the "Stranger Things in Honami" event where the current lineup of Resonators changed upon entering Honami City.
- Fixed an issue in the "Stranger Things in Honami" event where the same Sticker Stat Bonus was listed more than once in some situations.
- Fixed an issue in the "Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways" event where the effects of the selected Metaphor "Withering Dream" could be triggered while not in the Divined Dream state.
- Fixed an issue where the icon representing the "Search for It! Bits of Lahai-Roi" event continued to be present while in the "Black Shores - Chronorift Metropolis" area after the event had been completed.
 
●Quests
- Fixed an issue that caused incongruity between the behavior of Female Rover's character model and Male Rover's character model for some of Lynae's dialogue scenes in certain parts of the "Roya Frostlands - Stagnant Run" area after Main Quest "What Burns Beneath Frostlands" and Exploration Quest "The Lost Melody" had been completed.
- Fixed an issue where NPC Minna's character model remained on the screen after Exploration Quest "Where Light Takes Shape" was completed.
- Fixed an issue in Companion Story "Wild Heart's Return" where prompts indicating the direction of the bell might be missing during the objective "Go in the direction of the bell."
- Fixed an issue in Tutorial Quest "Off Means On" where the tracking feature became inaccessible during the objective "Check the WavesLine message."
 
●Environment
- Fixed an issue where characters floated above the surface while seated on certain chairs in the "Roya Frostlands - Startorch Academy - Academy Dormitory" area.
- Fixed an issue where certain Gemini Spore models in the Roya Frostlands did not disappear entirely after the item had been picked up.
- Fixed an issue where the water surface effects failed to display properly in certain parts of the "Roya Frostlands - Bjartr Woods" area.
- Fixed an issue where characters could go below the water surface in certain parts of the Roya Frostlands.
- Fixed an issue where the visuals in certain Roya Frostlands scenes performed abnormally when the game had been launched using DX11.
- Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the "Black Shores - Chronorift Metropolis" area floated above the surface.
- Fixed an issue where entering the "Rinascita - Septimont - Solis Tavern" could cause a switch to Trial Rover.
- Fixed an issue where the light/shadow effects failed to function normally in some scenes on PC with Ray Tracing enabled.
articleTitle: Patch Notes for Version 3.1: For You Who Walk in Snow
